name: Garden Bots
description:
Welcome To Camp Nature Bots!
In this summer camp you will have to guide robot to collecting resources and using card to survive!  

How to play:
1. Click on robots to open up there panel Then click on the resource you want them to collect!
2. Right click on the robot if you want to feed it 1 of every resource.
3. At the end of the day you will get 2 cards but you can only pick 1 of the cards.
4. make sure your robots don't die they lose hp every turn feed them to keep hem alive
5. If you have 3 robots alive or less then you lose!6.Use arrow keys to move the camera so you can look for stuff
Cards:
Dice Card - Right click it to destroy it and it adds random number 1 - 12 to each resource.
Devils Deal - If you lose the devil will give you a second chance but he will destroy all you cards.
Gods Goods - On the start of a new day God will give you a free random card but take away 5 wood from you
Classroom - When you get this card your robots will move 50% faster but the timer will go down by 5s
Factory - Adds 1 robot each day
Lumber Yield - Each robot make 1 wood at the end of the day  
Bomb - Blows up robots and gets 1 of everything for each robot it destroys 

DO NOT USE LUCKY FOOT, WOOD YEILD AND GODS GOODS THOSE CARDS ARE UNFORTANLY BROKEN!
